definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The street is jammed with taxis and pedicabs.
sentences.chinese: 整条街上到处是出租车和三轮车。

sentences.english: PLEASE DO NOT BID if you have not a previous cyclos installation to show me.
sentences.chinese: 请勿出价，如果你还没有安装以前的三轮车给我看。

sentences.english: And the one of my son is a trike that he built.
sentences.chinese: 那张我儿子的照片是在他自己做的三轮车上照的。

sentences.english: It has a rotary wing unit attached to a tricycle assembly through a hang bolt.
sentences.chinese: 它有一个旋转翼单位重视三轮车大会通过杭螺栓。

sentences.english: Trash collection is done using trucks and bicycles in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 在北京，收垃圾用的是卡车和三轮车。

sentences.english: Was really walk, had called the tricycle to carry us back.
sentences.chinese: 最后真的走不动了，只好叫三轮车载我们回去。

sentences.english: Tourists like these human-pedalled tricycle taxis, but they can be expensive.
sentences.chinese: 游客们喜欢乘坐这些三轮车，但它们车费可能很高。

sentences.english: At the hotel, a boy on a tricycle crashes into Joel.
sentences.chinese: 在宾馆，一个骑着儿童三轮车的男孩撞到乔尔。

sentences.english: Where can I get a pedicab?
At dusk, heading for Portuguese Square on a trishaw for a seafood feast.
sentences.chinese: 黄昏中坐着三轮车去葡萄牙村吃海鲜。

sentences.english: When I was a kid, I had a big wheels trike made of thick hard plastic.
sentences.chinese: 小时候我有一个粗笨的塑料制造的大车轮的三轮车。

sentences.english: He cannibalized his old bicycle to repair his tricycle.
sentences.chinese: 他把旧自行车的零件拆下来修配他的三轮车。

sentences.english: She paid attention to a girl, who was carried to the kindergarten on a pedicab by his father.
sentences.chinese: 她注意到一个女孩，女孩是坐着她父亲的三轮车来的。

sentences.english: Pedicabs like this are the means of transportation, and livelihood, for a lot of people in this small town.
sentences.chinese: 这种脚踏三轮车是小镇里很多人的交通和谋生工具。

sentences.english: The street is jammed with taxis and pedicabs .
sentences.chinese: 街道挤满了出租车和三轮车。

sentences.english: The pedals of his tricycle did not work.
sentences.chinese: 他的三轮车的踏板坏了。

definition: small model car/mini-car/small horse-cart/barrow/wheelbarrow/type of folk dance
open-topped container (mounted on a truck or cart) for carrying loads/dump box (of a dump truck)/bucket (of a front loader)/wheelbarrow
